name: Particle Prodigy
description:
Directions: Drag and drop particles from the toolbar, then press space to unfreeze time and watch what happens. Press the Lightbulb in the toolbar to reset.

This is VPEG's project for Jam 4 a Cause! VPEG's members are Van Edelman, Patrick Mitchell, Emily O'Shea, and Giovanni Alayan.

Particle Prodigy is mostly just a prototype / proof of concept, but it's a pretty nice one, in our humble opinions, especially considering how quickly it was made!
